# Welcome to Portugu√™s Goa üåé

![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0-blue.svg?cacheSeconds=2592000)
![issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/EzekielCarvalho/portugues-goa)
![stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/EzekielCarvalho/portugues-goa)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](#)

![Portugu√™s Goa Banner](./otherfiles/portuges_goa_banner.png "Welcome to Portugu√™s Goa!")

> An application designed and built with history lovers in mind. The website is more of a resource base on the history of Goa displaying the history of pre Portuguese, Portuguese and post Portuguese Goa. It involves outlining the need of learning history and being cognizant of it. The website also touches on news related matters. The site also features styles, overlay effects, cards, as well as an awesome carousel image viewer. The application contains numerous images which help you get a feel for the past. An entire page on the legacy left by the Portuguese is also included. In the homepage, the app features a background video playing, which helps make the site more appealing. There is also an entire page on clippings of news articles, which are again viewable via the image viewer. The site allows for users to contact the creator of the site via the Contact form, which accepts messages from users. These messages are stored with the help of Firebase. Above all this, the site is responsive.

<img src="./otherfiles/portugues_goa_gif.gif" width="100%" height="100%"/>


### üè† Visit the app here: [![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Portugu%C3%AAs-Goa-E66581.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://portuguese-goa.herokuapp.com/)

Please note that you may have to reload the site several times if some features don't load properly due to Heroku serving the site on a free basis.

## Key Features

* A website for history lovers of Goa
* Fully functional contact form with the help of Firebase
* awesome styles, overlay effects
* carousel image viewer allowing for downloads,     
full screen image viewing,  
ability to hide or show image thumbnails
* User Friendly interface
* Background video on homepage
* Responsive site

## Usage

It's pretty simple to clone this project, ensure that you've got Git and Node.js   
(you have to use npm) installed on your computer.

Then using your terminal:

```sh
# Clone this repository
$ git clone git@github.com:EzekielCarvalho/portugues-goa.git

# Head over into the repository
$ cd portugues-goa

# Install dependencies
$ npm install

# If there are any vulnerabilities
$ npm audit fix

# Then make the changes to the app as per your desire

# You can view the complete running app     
via the app deployed in Heroku

```

## Instructions 

To use this app, simply visit the site, and wait for the images and video to load and you are good to go.   
You can view various images and newspaper clippings, read articles. You can send feedback via the contact me page.
